>i would like someone that works for riot to respond

I don't work for Riot, but I have a pretty solid understanding of the punishment system.

You can indeed get banned for things like "nerd", although a single "nerd" here and there is *unlikely* to trigger anything. 

In general there's a difference between insults and BMing: "nerd" and "quitter" fall more on the insult side of things, while "nice ult" and "thanks for dragon!" and "u ok?" are more on the BMing side of things. The main difference here is that the latter ones may be poking fun at your opponents, but they aren't insulting them or attributing often negative attributes to them.
